issue.title: [C++] Add option to is_null kernel to return true on NaN
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13367](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13367). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently the `is_null` C++ kernel returns `false` on `NaN` values in floating point number data. Consider adding a boolean option to this kernel that could be used to make it return `true` on `NaN` values. This would allow the code added in ARROW-12055 to be much simplified.
